ingredients.item: 3 essential Waitrose leeks, cut into 2cm pieces
750g essential Waitrose potatoes, peeled and diced
400g can essential Waitrose cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and cook the leeks and potatoes for 5 minutes. Add the flour and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the stock, thyme and beans, and bring to the boil. Simmer for 15-20 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Serve with some crusty bread
